Keep field of view across levels
Ensure the field of view is kept the same across levels.
Play the music soundtrack over sound effects, when present and available.
Show the on-screen controls to move and interact with the game.
Enables features used to assist with debugging levels.
Use the following locale for all interface elements.
*boop* I don't know why Chelsea's so hard on herself; she's a pretty good game designer. And she's cute as a puppy!
Click or press the number keys to switch between costumes. Some costumes may unlock different abilities.
Click or press R to restart the level.
Use the slider or press the plus/minus keys to adjust your field of view.
